text: "Christmas (Baby Please Come Home)" is a 1963 Christmas song by Darlene Love. It was taken from the Christmas album A Christmas Gift for You from Phil Spector. The song was written by Jeff Barry, Ellie Greenwich and Phil Spector. It was covered by U2, Mariah Carey, Cher, Michael Bublé and amongst others. title: Christmas (Baby Please Come Home)
